topic.title: porting content into zeronet
topic.body: is there a *simple* way to port/convert stuff like wordpress sites/databases - and other such blogs - into  zeronet?

1_16KXPTbZn8PHFDcyeRaeQuKmNNFk55nrzP.body: wow! that sounds cool indeed! am kind of new here, how might i know when its ready to be tested?

> [crypton](#comment_30_17fgJ3tZjhM7HCkTkd5TWf2BLLWmhRKcXB): Follow one of my sites and I'll make the updates there http://127.0.0.1:43110/cryptonbits.bit (and probably also here on ZeroTalk)

fab! cheers for that!
